Texts.Eng:
Super-awesome digital beings with some amazingly cool niche gear.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Robotic

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Matter Manipulator: +^green;1^reset; Power
  Energy x^green;1.2^reset;
  +^green;4^reset;% Speed, +^green;5^reset;% Jump
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Electric
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: ^green;Electrified^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  -^red;40^reset;% Speed in Liquids

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Boomerang/Chakram: Damage x^green;1.125^reset;
  Swords and Daggers: +^green;2^reset; Defense

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.85^reset;,
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;50^reset;% Shadow
